# clipsToBounds

**Article**

A Boolean value that determines whether subviews are confined to the bounds of the view.

## Overview

`UILabel` inherits this property from the `UIView` parent class. This class changes the default value of this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Accessing additional attributes

- **isUserInteractionEnabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether the system ignores and removes user events for this label from the event queue.
